roundedarrowgrid.mastercontent: We offer a range of operational and administrative solutions customised to suit the requirements of your domiciliary care agency. Our team provides expert advice and assistance in setting up services aimed at improving the efficiency and compliance of your business operations.

data.content: We recommend and implement intuitive invoicing software to streamline your billing process.
We recommend and set up reliable payroll systems tailored to your agency’s needs, ensuring timely and accurate payments.
We help you select and integrate powerful CRM tools to enhance client management and service delivery.
We recommend the best care monitoring systems to ensure real-time tracking and management of care delivery.
We recommend trusted HR companies to manage recruitment, employee relations, and compliance with employment laws.
Receive expert guidance on implementing organised and efficient filing systems.
We recommend top accounting software and connect you with reliable accountants for seamless financial management.
We recommend services for DBS checks, staff training, nurse revalidation, and occupational health to ensure full compliance.

arrowpointbanner.mastercontent1: At Care Sync Experts, we’re committed to your success. As part of our package, you’ll receive a full year of dedicated support to help you run your domiciliary care agency efficiently. Our support covers:
arrowpointbanner.mastercontent2: We are dedicated to ensuring your success. As part of our package, you will receive a year of assistance to effectively manage your domiciliary care agency. Our support includes:
arrowpointbanner.mastercontent3: With our continuous support, you can focus on delivering outstanding care while we handle the rest.
arrowpointbanner.bannercontent: Your Vision, Our Expertise: Building the Future of Care Together

data.content: Expert advice on managing and growing your care agency.
Support for technical issues (excluding hardware) to keep your operations running smoothly.
Ongoing website support and updates to ensure optimal performance.
Six months of professional social media management to enhance your online presence.

mastercard.mastercontent: We understand the importance of your website as the face of your domiciliary care agency. Our goal is not to design websites but to establish an online presence that reflects your brand and fosters growth.

data.content: We secure your business domain (e.g., www.yourcompanyname.co.uk) for one year, giving you full control and management access.
We connect your social media profiles to your website making it easy for users to engage with you across platforms and helping foster a sense of community around your brand.
Our websites are designed to fully comply with GDPR, ensuring features like cookies notifications, privacy by design, and user data management are seamlessly integrated.

Enjoy a year of complimentary, secure hosting with Cpanel access, robust malware protection, and a free SSL certificate to enhance trust and security. After the first year, hosting renews at £39 per year.
Sleek, clean layouts that convey professionalism and instil trust.
Showcase positive feedback to build credibility and trust.
Quality, keyword-rich content to attract and engage your target audience.
Provide additional downloadable resources for clients and staff.
Enhance visual appeal with premium, licensed imagery.
Simplify recruitment with an integrated application form.
Seamless user experience across all devices, ensuring accessibility.
Advertise current vacancies directly on your website.
Intuitive navigation designed to keep visitors engaged.
Integrated calls to action to drive client engagement and conversions.
Connect your website to social platforms to broaden your reach.
Streamline communications with an integrated email management system.
Convenient access to application forms, timesheets, and essential documents.
A user-friendly control panel allowing easy updates to your website content.
Streamline communications with an integrated email management system.
Expand your website as your business grows, with no page limitations.

throutsupprtCQC.mastercontent: Assistance with CQC Registration Interview and Preparing for the Process
throutsupprtCQC.imagecontent1: Getting through the registration process of the
throutsupprtCQC.imagecontent2: can be quite tricky and time-consuming. Care Sync Experts offer clear guidance to help make the registration process for your home care agency seamless. We are here to help you fill out all the required forms correctly for both the provider and the registered manager, ensuring that everything is done accurately and in line with CQC regulations.

subcard.title: Application Form Assistance
subcard.content: Our team is here to support you in completing the application forms both for the provider and the registered manager. We make sure that all details are accurately filled in and that your application is well prepared for submission.

subcard.title: Statement of Purpose Preparation
subcard.content: We help create a statement of purpose that outlines your service goals, objectives, and the range of services you plan to offer. This document plays a role in showing the CQC your agency's dedication to delivering top-notch care.

subcard.title: Reviewing CVs for Compliance
subcard.content: We carefully assess the CVs of your Registered Manager and Nominated Individual to ensure they align with CQC standards. This involves verifying their credentials, experience, and suitability for their roles within your agency.

subcard.title: Liaison with CQC
subcard.content1: Our team engages directly with the
subcard.content2: on your behalf, handling any requirements and providing supporting documents. We manage all communication to ensure a smooth registration process.

data.content: Work with our team to develop a detailed business plan tailored to your care agency, including cash flow forecasts and profit and loss statements to ensure financial stability and growth.>
We assist in brainstorming and selecting a business name that is memorable, marketable, and perfectly suited to your agency's mission and services.

data.content1: We handle the entire registration process with
data.content2: , providing you with all necessary legal documents, both digitally and by post.
data.name: Companies House

data.content2: your company as an official employer, ensuring compliance with all employment regulations, including PAYE setup.
data.name: register

data.content: Get expert guidance on the necessary technology, tools, and systems to efficiently run your care agency from day one.
Our team assists you in identifying and securing the ideal office location that meets your operational needs.
We manage the VAT registration process for your company, ensuring all tax obligations are met from the start.
Enhance your communication with a virtual telephone number, professionally set up to manage client and partner calls.
Automatically register for corporation tax with HMRC during company formation, ensuring your business meets all tax obligations.

FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.title: DOMICILIARY CARE
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.sub: Start Your Home Care Business with Our All Inclusive Support Package.
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.content: Transform your vision of running a successful home care agency into reality with Care Sync Experts.

card.title: What is Domiciliary Care?
card.content1: Domiciliary care, also referred to as Home care provides vital personal and practical assistance to individuals within the comfort of their own homes. Care Sync Experts specialises in guiding entrepreneurs and providers through the process of establishing successful domiciliary care agencies.
card.content2: This service is crucial for meeting the needs of elderly individuals, people with disabilities, those recovering from illness or surgery, and others requiring assistance with daily living activities.

fourCard_data.heading: With our expertise, you can confidently set up a domiciliary care agency that offers services such as:
fourCard_data.content: We aim to assist you in establishing a care agency that promotes independence, enhances quality of life, and allows individuals to receive the support they need in the comfort of their own homes. Our consultancy services that cover every aspect of starting and running a domiciliary care business, ensuring your success from day one.

layer.title: Personal care
layer.description: Assistance with bathing, dressing, and daily hygiene.

layer.title: Household tasks
layer.description: Support with cleaning, cooking, and household management.

layer.title: Medical support
layer.description: Administering medication and monitoring health conditions.

layer.title: Companionship
layer.description: Providing emotional and social support to clients.

rightSide.heading: DO YOU PREFER OFFLINE READING?
rightSide.description: Download a PDF version of our Domiciliary Care Agency Package

FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.title: TEMPORARY STAFFING AGENCY
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.sub: Launch and Grow Your Temporary Staffing Agency with Confidence
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.content: We provide a package for Temporary Staffing that is tailored to support you in setting up a temporary staffing agency within the social care field. Our experience guarantees that you can effectively handle the complexities of the sector and establish a business centred on delivering notch adaptable staffing solutions.

FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.title: SUPPORTED LIVING
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.sub: Your Blueprint for Establishing and Running a Thriving Supported Living Service

card.title: Empower Lives with Our Expertly Crafted Supported Living Solutions
card.content1: Setting up a successful Supported Living service is more than just a business. It involves nurturing an environment where individuals can flourish. Care Sync Experts offers a plan to help you establish and oversee a service that prioritises independence, dignity and quality of life. Our customised package provides you with the knowledge and resources to surpass industry expectations and contribute meaningfully to the healthcare sector.

FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.title: CIW DOMICILIARY CARE
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.sub: Start Your Domiciliary Care Business in Wales with Our Complete Setup Package
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.content: Make your dream of owning a home care company in Wales a reality by utilising our CIW (Care Inspectorate Wales) Domiciliary Care Agency Setup Package. At Care Sync Experts we provide the expertise and resources to help your care agency meet all standards and excel in delivering top quality care.

FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.title: RQIA DOMICILIARY CARE AGENCY
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.sub: Build Your Leading Domiciliary Care Agency in Northern Ireland Today
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.content: Setting up an RQIA compliant Domiciliary Care Agency requires precision and expertise. At Care Sync Experts, we provide the essential guidance and resources to help you navigate RQIA regulations with ease. Our package equips you with the knowledge and tools to build a high-quality, compliant care agency that stands out in the healthcare sector. Start your journey to excellence and ensure your agency meets the highest standards from day one.

FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.title: COMBINED CARE AGENCY
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.sub: Unite Domiciliary Care and Temporary Staffing for Unmatched Flexibility and Quality
FullImageWithCardBottomComponent.content: Elevate Your Care Agency with Our Combined Package
